meanings.definition: The act of changing the texture of something.
meanings.sent1: The retexturing of the wall made it feel rougher.
meanings.sent2: The retexturing of the fabric gave it a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: After retexturing the cake with frosting, it looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her retexturing of the painting transformed it into a tactile masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The retexturing of the paper created a bumpy surface for drawing.

meanings.definition: The process of applying a new texture to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The retexturing of the floor made it safer to walk on.
meanings.sent2: The retexturing of the ceiling added depth to the room.
meanings.sent3: The retexturing of the sidewalk with chalk made it a colorful path.
meanings.sent4: His retexturing of the sculpture turned it into a tactile experience.
meanings.sent5: The retexturing of the wood paneling gave it a rustic feel.
